metadata.name: Catarase Pws 300units 2ml 270 FIP units Tablet delayed release

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Chymotrypsin is a digestive enzyme synthesized in the pancreas that plays an essential role in proteolysis or the breakdown of proteins and polypeptides As a component in the pancreatic juice chymotrypsin aids in the digestion of proteins in the duodenum by preferentially cleaving peptide amide bonds
